A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
TLJ was a travesty! Worst SW movie yet! The mischaracterization of established characters\, the lack of story line continuity from George Lucas's original and the squandering and missed opportunities of newly introduced characters from the Force Awakens makes for a bad story\, weak dialogue\, inconsistencies\, and undeveloped characters\, makes for a lazy\, unorganized movie that doesn't fit into a movie that's suppose to be part of a bigger trilogy.
Weak Sauce!
